job_title: Business Data Analyst with OBIEE exp

job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s Degree in an Information Technology related field, from an accredited institution.

jd: From: Sachin, Sspearhead Inc. sachin@sspearhead.com Reply to: sachin@sspearhead.com Job Details:Business Data Analyst with OBIEE exp- Day 1 onsiteAlbany, NYLong Term Mandatory Qualification Software Analyst Studies the software application domain, prepares software requirements, and specification documents. Liaises between the software users and the software developers. Conveys the demands of software users to the developers. Skills include: working knowledge of software technology; computer programming experience/expertise; general business knowledge; problem solving/reduction skills; interpersonal relation skills; flexibility and adaptability. Expert 84+ months: Candidate is able to provide guidance to large teams and/or has extensive industry experience and is considered at the top of his/her field. Qualification Number Requested Qualifications:1. 84 months of experience creating SQL queries and stored procedures using Oracle PL/SQL.2. 84 months of experience meeting with business staff to elicit business requirements.3. 84 months of experience working with business staff or end users to analyze or troubleshoot Oracle reports.4. 84 months creating software documentation including functional specifications and technical specifications.5. 48 months of experience preparing or facilitating the creation of testing scenarios and test scripts.6. 36 months of experience creating user documentation such as user guides or training presentations.7. 36 months of experience using OBIEE (Oracle Business Intelligence Enterprise Edition), including end user experience.8. Bachelor’s Degree in an Information Technology related field, from an accredited institution. Thanks,SachinSspearhead Inc.www.Sspearhead.com
